definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: The world is much larger than you can imagine right now.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界的深广远超你现在想象的边际。

sentences.english: The soccer dance had a long history and profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 巫舞历史悠远，影响深广。

sentences.english: This requires limitless range and unfathomable depth of vision.
sentences.chinese: 这要求有无限深广的视野。

sentences.english: They bathe themselves in the bottomless, shoreless sea of infinite beatitude.
sentences.chinese: 他们在汪洋，深广无限的福乐大海中沐浴自己。

sentences.english: DHC's brand products in the world the greatest social impact.
sentences.chinese: DHC的品牌产品在全球影响深广。

sentences.english: But the divide between these private schools and others is widening.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些私立学校与其它学校的分歧却愈发深广。

sentences.english: Opening up deep extension of poem affection space.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌情思空间的拓深广延。

definition: to contain/to hold/content/(of a poem etc) full of implicit meaning
to understand clearly/to be sensible or reasonable/understanding
